cta.description.dev: Keen to join the build of the platform? Find us on Github and Gitter. All skill levels are welcome.
cta.description.volunteer:
If youâ€™re keen to get involved in volunteer operations and help run
          things, join the channel on Gitter.
cta.description.sponsor: Donations and long term support help speed up the development of the voluntarily platform and be more effective in the lives of young Kiwis.
actDetailForm.Subtitle: Create a template that teachers can use to bring in volunteers
actDetailForm.AboutSection.subtitle: About this Activity
actDetailForm.AboutSection.instructions: Attract people to this activity with a snappy name, use the subtitle to layout the basic idea.
actDetailForm.TagsSection.subtitle: Topics
actDetailForm.TagsSection.instructions: Make this activity searchable by classifying it with subject, age group, and technology keywords.
actDetailForm.ResourceSection.subtitle: Requirements
actDetailForm.ResourceSection.instructio:
What is the time commitment?
                    How many people do you need to help?
                    What skills might they require?
                    Do you need a special space or location to work in?
                    Does this activity require special equipment?
actDetailForm.addEquipment.title: Equipment needed (Optional)
actDetailForm.addEquipment.instructions: Let volunteers and businesses know what you need to make the opportunity happen.
actDetailForm.addEquipment.validationMes: Add an equipment or remove field
actDetailForm.addImageSection.title: Add an image
actDetailForm.addImageSection.instructio: Activities with illustrations get more responses. If you don't have a photo click suggest and we can provide one based on the tags.
act.SaveInstructions: Save as Draft will allow you to preview the activity while Publish will make it available to everyone to view.
demo.greeting: Replace in translation with Hello World!
footer.credit: Voluntarily is an awesome open source project run by the
interestArchiveSection.name: Volunteers
interestSection.name: Interested Volunteers
getInvolvedHeading: How do you want to get involved?
getInvolvedSubHeading: Type in how you want to get involved, and an organizer will get in touch with you :)
isInterestedHeading: Thank you for expressing your interest!
isInterestedSubHeading: The organizer will be in touch shortly :)
isInvitedSubHeading: Please let the organizer know whether you can attend.
isCommittedSubHeading: You have agreed to participate in this event!
isDeclinedSubHeading: Thank you so much for registering your interest. However, all available spots for this event have been filled.
isCompletedSubHeading: We hope you enjoyed your event, and we look forward to working with you in the future!
isCancelledSubHeading: Thank you so much for registering your interest. However, unfortunately this event has been cancelled by the organizer.
member.follow.message: Follow this organisation to get information on opportunities and offerings
member.join.message: If you are part of this organisation let us know
member.validating.message: Your confirmation as a member of this organisation is in progess
member.member.message: You are a member of this organisation
opdetail.pagesubtitle:
Ask volunteers for assistance with anything related to tech - there
                are (get number) of volunteers looking for opportunities to help out
op.SaveInstructions: Save as Draft will allow you to preview the request while Publish will make it available to everyone to view.
orgdetail.social.label: Social:
orgDetail.form.title: Manage Organisation
orgDetail.form.aboutSubtitle: Tell the world a little bit about your organisation.
orgDetail.form.ContactAbout: How do you want teachers and schools to get in touch with you?
orgDetail.form.StaffAbout: What processes do you want staff to do before they start volunteering? Should they fill in a form? Ask for approval from their manager? Specify your instructions here.
orgDetail.form.PartnerAbout: Is there anything you want partners who collaborate on CSR activities with you to know? Write it here
orgDetail.form.HowAbout: How do you want teachers and schools to get in touch with you?
orgDetail.form.StaffInternalAbout: Anything you want to only tell staff about? ie: Where to get Company T-Shirts before volunteering
orgDetail.form.PublicAbout: What do you want to tell schools and teachers about your organisation? What do you offer?
orgDetail.form.GodModeAbout: Admin section for changing orgtype - Be Careful!

imageUploadComponentMessage: Click or drag file to this area to upload
error.pagenotfound.title: Oh no! Page not found
error.pagenotfound.description: The page you are looking for is not here. We have looked everywhere but it doesn't seem to exist. Perhaps it just hasn't been built yet.
error.pagenotfound.contribute: If you can write code you can help fix that by becoming a contributor to the project.
error.servererror.title: There was a problem
error.servererror.description: Sorry, there was a problem and we can not complete this task. We have let our team know so they can take a look and fix it. For now try to refresh the page, or go back to the previous page
